title: Was Ziggs here? Something...blew up on this page. Please give it another shot later.
body: im wondering if this is a decline on my application to the pbe

replies.body:
You just need to change this -

https://pbesignup.**euw**.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup

Let´s say that you have a NA account. Then you just need to swap from `euw` to `na`

from this
https://pbesignup.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup

To This
https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup

And is should work!

Leave a comment if it didn´t :)

How i can fix this ?
{{champion:115}} was here !
Was Ziggs here? Something...blew up on this page. Please give it another shot later.
xD guys you need to be lvl 30 xD i'm not by the way then i used my friend account that is lvl30 and it works probably if you are not 30 lvl it will not gonna work.I hope I helped;)

It sounds like this may have been due to a browser or extension error.  Trying again on another browser or Incognito should solve this, meaning you may need to[ clear your cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies).  I looked into your specific issue just in case, and verified that your PBE application was previously received!

Are you lvl 30 beacause for pbe account you need to be lvl 30 sorry if you already are but i'm not
you need to be lvl 30,SORRY IF YOU ALREADY ARE XD
